tasks.title: Project Setup and Environment Configuration
tasks.description: Set up the development environment and configure all necessary API keys and dependencies for the Pain-Gap Audit Automation Script.
tasks.details: Configure API keys for SerpApi, Google PageSpeed Insights API, BuiltWith API. Set up Python environment with required packages (requests, pandas, pillow, google-api-python-client). Configure Google Sheets API access. Set up cloud storage for PDFs. Create .env file for environment variables.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all API connections work and environment is ready for development. Test each API endpoint individually.

subtasks.title: Set up Python development environment
subtasks.description: Install Python and required packages (requests, pandas, pillow, google-api-python-client)
subtasks.details: Create virtual environment, install dependencies via pip, verify all packages are working correctly

subtasks.title: Configure API keys and environment variables
subtasks.description: Set up API keys for SerpApi, Google PageSpeed Insights API, BuiltWith API
subtasks.details: Create .env file, add all required API keys, test API connections individually

subtasks.title: Set up Google Sheets API access
subtasks.description: Configure Google Sheets API credentials and permissions
subtasks.details: Create Google Cloud project, enable Sheets API, create service account, download credentials

subtasks.title: Configure cloud storage for PDFs
subtasks.description: Set up cloud storage solution for storing generated PDFs
subtasks.details: Choose storage provider (Google Drive, AWS S3, etc.), configure access, test upload/download functionality

tasks.title: Lead Ingestion and Scraping System
tasks.description: Implement the Google Maps scraping functionality using SerpApi to collect business listings from Central Valley cities.
tasks.details: Create input system for business categories and cities. Implement SerpApi Google Maps Organic Results scraping with pagination handling. Extract Business Name, Website URL, Phone Number, Google Business Profile Link, Physical Address. Output to CSV/Google Sheets format. Handle rate limits and errors gracefully.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scraping with sample categories and cities, verify all required fields are captured correctly. Test with different city/category combinations.

subtasks.title: Create input system for business categories and cities
subtasks.description: Build system to accept and validate business categories and Central Valley cities
subtasks.details: Create input validation, define Central Valley city list, create category mapping system

subtasks.title: Implement SerpApi Google Maps scraping
subtasks.description: Build core scraping functionality using SerpApi for Google Maps Organic Results
subtasks.details: Integrate SerpApi, implement search queries, handle API responses, extract business data

subtasks.title: Extract required business data fields
subtasks.description: Extract Business Name, Website URL, Phone Number, Google Business Profile Link, Physical Address
subtasks.details: Parse API responses, validate data quality, handle missing fields gracefully

subtasks.title: Implement pagination handling
subtasks.description: Handle multiple pages of search results to get comprehensive business listings
subtasks.details: Implement page navigation, track progress, handle end of results gracefully

subtasks.title: Output data to CSV/Google Sheets format
subtasks.description: Format scraped data for output to CSV files and Google Sheets
subtasks.details: Create data formatting functions, implement CSV export, prepare Google Sheets upload format

subtasks.title: Handle rate limits and errors gracefully
subtasks.description: Implement error handling and rate limiting for SerpApi calls
subtasks.details: Add exponential backoff, error logging, retry logic for failed requests

tasks.title: Website Performance Analysis
tasks.description: Implement PageSpeed Insights API integration to analyze mobile performance scores for scraped websites.
tasks.details: Integrate Google PageSpeed Insights API. Process each website URL from scraped data. Extract mobile performance score. Handle API rate limits with exponential backoff strategy. Log errors to 'Error Notes' column. Implement retry logic for failed requests.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with sample websites, verify score extraction and error handling for failed API calls. Test rate limit handling.

subtasks.title: Integrate Google PageSpeed Insights API
subtasks.description: Set up PageSpeed Insights API integration and authentication
subtasks.details: Configure API credentials, test API connection, implement base API wrapper

subtasks.title: Process website URLs from scraped data
subtasks.description: Extract and validate website URLs from scraped business data
subtasks.details: Filter valid URLs, handle missing websites, prepare URL list for analysis

subtasks.title: Extract mobile performance scores
subtasks.description: Call PageSpeed Insights API and extract mobile performance scores
subtasks.details: Make API calls for each URL, parse response data, extract mobile score (0-100)

subtasks.title: Handle API rate limits with exponential backoff
subtasks.description: Implement rate limiting strategy for PageSpeed Insights API calls
subtasks.details: Add exponential backoff retry logic, respect API quotas, handle rate limit errors

subtasks.title: Log errors to 'Error Notes' column
subtasks.description: Track and log API errors and failures for analysis
subtasks.details: Create error logging system, categorize errors, add to Error Notes column in output

subtasks.title: Implement retry logic for failed requests
subtasks.description: Add retry mechanism for failed PageSpeed Insights API calls
subtasks.details: Implement retry with backoff, track failed URLs, provide fallback handling

tasks.title: Technology Stack Analysis
tasks.description: Implement BuiltWith API integration to determine technology age and stack information for scraped websites.
tasks.details: Integrate BuiltWith API. Process each website URL from scraped data. Extract technology stack information. Determine technology age and identify outdated technologies. Handle API rate limits and errors gracefully. Store tech stack data for scoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with sample websites, verify technology stack extraction and error handling. Test with various technology stacks.

subtasks.title: Integrate BuiltWith API
subtasks.description: Set up BuiltWith API integration and authentication
subtasks.details: Configure API credentials, test API connection, implement base API wrapper

subtasks.title: Process website URLs for technology analysis
subtasks.description: Extract and validate website URLs for BuiltWith analysis
subtasks.details: Filter valid URLs, handle missing websites, prepare URL list for technology analysis

subtasks.title: Extract technology stack information
subtasks.description: Call BuiltWith API and extract detailed technology stack data
subtasks.details: Make API calls for each URL, parse response data, extract technology categories and versions

subtasks.title: Determine technology age and identify outdated technologies
subtasks.description: Analyze technology stack to identify outdated or problematic technologies
subtasks.details: Create technology age scoring system, identify outdated frameworks, flag problematic technologies

subtasks.title: Handle API rate limits and errors gracefully
subtasks.description: Implement error handling and rate limiting for BuiltWith API calls
subtasks.details: Add exponential backoff, error logging, retry logic for failed requests

subtasks.title: Store tech stack data for scoring
subtasks.description: Organize and store technology stack data for lead scoring analysis
subtasks.details: Create data structure for tech stack info, prepare data for scoring algorithm integration

tasks.title: Lead Scoring and Classification
tasks.description: Implement pain scoring logic to classify leads as 'RED' or 'GREEN' based on performance and technology criteria.
tasks.details: Apply pain scoring algorithm. Tag leads as 'RED' if mobile speed score < 60/100. Add 'Status' column to lead list. Combine PageSpeed and BuiltWith data for comprehensive scoring. Consider technology age in scoring logic. Create scoring dashboard for analysis.
tasks.testStrategy: Test scoring logic with sample data, verify correct classification of leads. Test edge cases and boundary conditions.

subtasks.title: Apply pain scoring algorithm
subtasks.description: Implement the core pain scoring logic based on performance and technology criteria
subtasks.details: Create scoring algorithm, define scoring weights, implement calculation logic

subtasks.title: Tag leads as 'RED' or 'GREEN' based on mobile speed score
subtasks.description: Classify leads based on mobile performance score threshold (< 60/100 = RED)
subtasks.details: Implement classification logic, apply threshold rules, tag leads appropriately

subtasks.title: Add 'Status' column to lead list
subtasks.description: Create Status column in output data to track lead classification
subtasks.details: Add Status field to data structure, populate with RED/GREEN values, update output format

subtasks.title: Combine PageSpeed and BuiltWith data for comprehensive scoring
subtasks.description: Integrate performance and technology data for holistic lead scoring
subtasks.details: Merge data from both APIs, create unified scoring model, balance performance vs technology factors

subtasks.title: Consider technology age in scoring logic
subtasks.description: Factor in technology age and obsolescence in the scoring algorithm
subtasks.details: Weight older technologies higher in pain scoring, identify technology debt indicators

subtasks.title: Create scoring dashboard for analysis
subtasks.description: Build dashboard to visualize and analyze lead scoring results
subtasks.details: Create scoring analytics interface, display RED vs GREEN distribution, show scoring breakdowns

tasks.title: Website Screenshot Capture
tasks.description: Implement full-page screenshot functionality for 'RED' leads' current homepages.
tasks.details: Create screenshot capture system for 'RED' leads using Selenium or Playwright. Take full-page screenshots of business homepages. Handle various website layouts and loading times. Store screenshots in cloud storage. Implement screenshot quality validation.
tasks.testStrategy: Test screenshot capture with sample 'RED' leads, verify quality and completeness. Test with various website types.

subtasks.title: Create screenshot capture system for 'RED' leads
subtasks.description: Build system to capture screenshots of 'RED' lead websites
subtasks.details: Implement screenshot capture logic, filter for RED leads only, create capture queue

subtasks.title: Take full-page screenshots of business homepages
subtasks.description: Capture complete webpage screenshots including below-the-fold content
subtasks.details: Implement full-page capture, handle dynamic content, ensure complete page capture

subtasks.title: Handle various website layouts and loading times
subtasks.description: Manage different website structures and loading scenarios
subtasks.details: Handle responsive layouts, wait for content loading, manage timeouts gracefully

subtasks.title: Store screenshots in cloud storage
subtasks.description: Save captured screenshots to cloud storage for later use
subtasks.details: Upload screenshots to cloud storage, organize by business name, create accessible URLs

subtasks.title: Implement screenshot quality validation
subtasks.description: Ensure captured screenshots meet quality standards
subtasks.details: Validate screenshot dimensions, check for errors, verify image quality and completeness

tasks.title: Logo Extraction and Fallback System
tasks.description: Implement logo extraction from business websites with fallback to generated text-based logos.
tasks.details: Extract business logo URLs from websites using web scraping techniques. Implement fallback system using Pillow (Python) to generate 400×120px colored rectangles with business name in 700-weight Poppins white text. Handle logo extraction failures gracefully. Create logo validation system.
tasks.testStrategy: Test logo extraction with various website types, verify fallback system works correctly. Test with websites that have no logos.

subtasks.title: Extract business logo URLs from websites
subtasks.description: Implement web scraping to find and extract logo URLs from business websites
subtasks.details: Use web scraping techniques, search for logo elements, extract logo URLs and metadata

subtasks.title: Implement fallback system using Pillow
subtasks.description: Create fallback logo generation when logo extraction fails
subtasks.details: Use Pillow to generate 400×120px colored rectangles with business name in 700-weight Poppins white text

subtasks.title: Handle logo extraction failures gracefully
subtasks.description: Implement error handling for logo extraction process
subtasks.details: Detect extraction failures, trigger fallback system, log errors appropriately

subtasks.title: Create logo validation system
subtasks.description: Validate extracted and generated logos for quality and usability
subtasks.details: Check logo dimensions, format, quality, ensure logos are suitable for PDF generation

tasks.title: PDF Template Design
tasks.description: Create the Google Slides template for Pain-Gap Audit PDFs with placeholder frames for dynamic content.
tasks.details: Design one-page audit template in Google Slides. Include placeholder frames for: screenshot, logo, 3 bullet points (pain points), mock-up image. Ensure template is ready for Make.com automation. Create template with professional design and branding.
tasks.testStrategy: Test template with sample content, verify all placeholders work correctly with Make.com. Test PDF export quality.

subtasks.title: Design one-page audit template in Google Slides
subtasks.description: Create the base template structure for Pain-Gap Audit PDFs
subtasks.details: Design professional one-page layout, include all required sections, ensure proper spacing and branding

subtasks.title: Include placeholder frames for dynamic content
subtasks.description: Add placeholder frames for screenshot, logo, 3 bullet points, and mock-up image
subtasks.details: Create placeholder frames for: screenshot, logo, 3 bullet points (pain points), mock-up image

subtasks.title: Ensure template is ready for Make.com automation
subtasks.description: Configure template for seamless integration with Make.com automation
subtasks.details: Set up template with proper naming conventions, ensure placeholders are Make.com compatible

subtasks.title: Create template with professional design and branding
subtasks.description: Apply professional design principles and branding to the template
subtasks.details: Use consistent colors, fonts, spacing, add company branding, ensure professional appearance

tasks.title: Make.com Automation Setup
tasks.description: Configure Make.com scenario to automate PDF generation from Google Sheets data.
tasks.details: Create 3-step Make.com scenario: 1) Watch for new 'RED' lead rows in Google Sheet, 2) Populate Google Slides template with dynamic data, 3) Export as PDF and save to Google Drive. Write public Drive link back to original sheet. Implement error handling in Make.com scenario.
tasks.testStrategy: Test Make.com scenario with sample data, verify PDF generation and link writing works correctly. Test error handling.

subtasks.title: Create 3-step Make.com scenario
subtasks.description: Build the core Make.com automation workflow with 3 main steps
subtasks.details: Step 1: Watch for new 'RED' lead rows in Google Sheet, Step 2: Populate Google Slides template, Step 3: Export as PDF

subtasks.title: Watch for new 'RED' lead rows in Google Sheet
subtasks.description: Configure Make.com to monitor Google Sheet for new RED lead entries
subtasks.details: Set up Google Sheets trigger, filter for RED status, detect new rows automatically

subtasks.title: Populate Google Slides template with dynamic data
subtasks.description: Configure Make.com to fill template placeholders with lead data
subtasks.details: Map sheet data to template placeholders, populate screenshot, logo, bullet points, business info

subtasks.title: Export as PDF and save to Google Drive
subtasks.description: Configure PDF export and Google Drive storage in Make.com
subtasks.details: Export populated slides as PDF, save to Google Drive, organize by business name

subtasks.title: Write public Drive link back to original sheet
subtasks.description: Update Google Sheet with PDF link after generation
subtasks.details: Create public share link for PDF, write link back to original sheet row, track completion status

subtasks.title: Implement error handling in Make.com scenario
subtasks.description: Add error handling and logging to Make.com automation
subtasks.details: Add error handling for failed operations, implement retry logic, log errors appropriately

tasks.title: Data Pipeline Integration
tasks.description: Integrate all components to create the complete automated pipeline from scraping to PDF generation.
tasks.details: Connect Python script to write 'RED' lead data to dedicated Google Sheet. Ensure Make.com watches this sheet for new rows. Test complete pipeline from scraping to PDF generation. Implement error handling and logging throughout. Create monitoring dashboard.
tasks.testStrategy: Run end-to-end test with sample data, verify complete automation works without manual intervention. Test error recovery.

subtasks.title: Connect Python script to write 'RED' lead data to dedicated Google Sheet
subtasks.description: Integrate Python script output with Google Sheets for Make.com monitoring
subtasks.details: Configure Python script to write RED leads to specific Google Sheet, format data for Make.com consumption

subtasks.title: Ensure Make.com watches this sheet for new rows
subtasks.description: Configure Make.com trigger to monitor the dedicated Google Sheet
subtasks.details: Set up Make.com to watch specific sheet, detect new RED lead rows, trigger automation

subtasks.title: Test complete pipeline from scraping to PDF generation
subtasks.description: End-to-end testing of the complete automation pipeline
subtasks.details: Test full workflow: scraping → analysis → scoring → screenshot/logo → PDF generation → sheet update

subtasks.title: Implement error handling and logging throughout
subtasks.description: Add comprehensive error handling across all pipeline components
subtasks.details: Add error handling for each component, implement logging system, create error recovery procedures

subtasks.description: Build dashboard to monitor pipeline performance and status
subtasks.details: Create monitoring interface, track pipeline metrics, display system status and alerts

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize the system to process at least 200 leads per day and generate 50+ 'RED' audits.
tasks.details: Implement batch processing for API calls. Optimize database queries and data handling. Implement caching where appropriate. Monitor and optimize performance bottlenecks. Ensure cost per 'RED' lead stays under $0.50. Implement parallel processing where possible.
tasks.testStrategy: Load test with 200+ leads, verify performance targets are met and costs are within budget. Monitor resource usage.

subtasks.title: Implement batch processing for API calls
subtasks.description: Optimize API calls by processing leads in batches
subtasks.details: Group API calls into batches, implement batch processing logic, optimize API usage

subtasks.description: Add parallel processing to improve throughput and reduce processing time
subtasks.details: Implement concurrent API calls, parallel data processing, optimize for multi-core systems

tasks.title: Error Handling and Reliability
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive error handling and logging throughout the system.
tasks.details: Add error handling for failed API calls, missing websites, broken URLs. Implement exponential backoff for rate limits. Create comprehensive logging system. Add 'Error Notes' column to track issues. Ensure system doesn't crash on errors. Implement alerting for critical failures.
tasks.testStrategy: Test with intentionally broken data, verify error handling works and system remains stable. Test recovery procedures.

tasks.title: Deployment and Hosting Setup
tasks.description: Deploy the system to a low-cost cloud hosting solution with scheduled execution.
tasks.details: Choose hosting solution (DigitalOcean Droplet, Heroku Hobby Dyno, AWS Lambda, or Google Cloud Functions). Set up cron job for scheduled execution. Configure environment variables and secrets. Implement monitoring and alerting. Set up backup and recovery procedures.
tasks.testStrategy: Deploy to staging environment, verify scheduled execution works correctly. Test monitoring and alerting systems.

tasks.title: VA Handoff System
tasks.description: Create clean, simple output system for Virtual Assistant to use without technical interpretation.
tasks.details: Design final Google Sheet output format for VA. Include all necessary information for follow-up calls. Ensure PDF links are easily accessible. Create simple instructions for VA usage. Test with VA to ensure usability. Implement VA training materials.
tasks.testStrategy: Have VA test the system, verify they can easily use the output to book '$1 demos'. Test with multiple VA scenarios.

metadata.description: Automated script to identify and qualify small business sales leads in California's Central Valley, generating personalized Pain-Gap Audit PDFs at scale.
